parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inability to read the speedometer in bright sunlight can cause the driver to be unaware of their speed, leading to potential accidents, loss of control, or failure to comply with speed limits.
symptoms: The speedometer is difficult or impossible to read in bright sunlight
the speedometer is blacked out
the driver is unable to determine their speed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The speedometer display is difficult or impossible to read, especially during daytime hours, which can pose a hazard to the rider and others on the road as they are unable to accurately monitor their speed.
symptoms: The speedometer display is too dim
lacks contrast
and is washed out by sunlight
making it difficult or impossible to read the current speed
especially when riding into or tangentially to the sun.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Failure Due to Design Flaw
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and complete failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to stall without warning, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls without warning
the transmission fails suddenly and completely
the vehicle is unable to move or operate.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Fork and Steering System Instability
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The "death wobble" phenomenon can cause a loss of control, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences a sudden
severe wobbling or shaking of the front end
typically at speeds around 45 mph
making it difficult to maintain control
the handlebars or steering wheel shake violently
the vehicle pulls to one side or the other.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake master cylinder can cause a loss of braking power, making it difficult or impossible to stop the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal travels further than usual
the brake pedal has a delayed response
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
the brake warning light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The deterioration of the drive belt pulley can cause a loud grinding noise, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing the motorcycle to stall or leave the rider stranded. This can increase the risk of an accident, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Loud grinding noise near the rear of the motorcycle
drive belt pulley deterioration on both sides of the motorcycle
loss of power
motorcycle stalling.
